# ApnaJhola

> Fresh Groceries, Delivered Fast.

ApnaJhola is a hyper-local grocery delivery service delivering fresh vegetables, fruits, and daily essentials in minutes.
Currently serving exclusively in **Renukoot, Sonebhadra**.

## Core Features
- **Super Fast Delivery**: Get your order delivered in as fast as 10-20 minutes.
- **Quality Guarantee**: Freshness ensured. Instant replacement if not satisfied.
- **No Minimum Order**: We fulfill orders of all sizes.

## Navigation
- [Home](https://apnajhola.in/)
- [Products](https://apnajhola.in/products)
- [About Us](https://apnajhola.in/about)
- [Contact](https://apnajhola.in/contact)
- [Privacy Policy](https://apnajhola.in/privacy-policy)
- [Terms of Use](https://apnajhola.in/terms-of-use)

## Technical Details
- Built with Next.js 16 and Tailwind CSS.
- Mobile-first responsive design.
